header.subtitle: Strategic partnership
header.title: iTalent Profile
header.des-1: Deep dive into your personality, ability and career interest within 45 minutes.
header.des-2: Best-designed for grade 6-12 with certified science credentials from IBM Kenexa and Everything DISC.

introduce.title: What is an iTalent Profile?
introduce.text-1: iTalent Profile provide students with a scientific and up-to-date approach to define their dream career within 3 factors: aptitude ability, personality and career interest.
introduce.text-2: Customized for students grading 6-12, iTalent Profile helps them to summarize their talent and raise their awareness in career orientation and self-development.
introduce.text-3: JobTest has been supporting more than 200,000 students nationally and internationally from High schools, top universities such as Vinschools, UNIST Korea, SMU Singapore, UEL, FPT...

benefit.title: What benefits iTalent Profile provide you!

structure.title: Structure of an iTalent Profile
structure.text-13: Part 2: Personality test based on DISC theory targeting at 4 personality trends:
structure.text-20: Part 3: Career Interest Test based on Holland Code theory:

question.title: Sample Question and Report
question.text-1: A collection of 120 questions categorized into specific parts
question.text-2: The JobTest report helps show general result and analytics of your aptitude ability, personality behaviors and career interest!

about.text-1: JobTest is an international standard human resource development consulting company based on a combination of leading HR and Technology experts. Application of artificial intelligence (AI), connected things (IOT - Internet of things), digital human resources (Digital workforce) and digital platforms (Platform, Blockchain, Big data).
about.text-2: Currently, JobTest is the leading online career guidance and competency assessment platform in Vietnam, as well as a provider of international standard human resource solutions, creating high-quality human resources for businesses.
about.text-3: In December 2021, JobTest Human Resource Development Consulting Company officially became the first strategic partner of Everything DiSC in Vietnam.
about.text-4: Everything DiSC - a brand of John Wiley and Sons Group - which has the largest book library platform in the world. Wiley and Sons contributes to improving work performance, providing experience and efficiency for human resource development, teamwork, talent discovery, leadership development for individuals and businesses worldwide bridge.
